title: Down To Play
tagline: The simple app for next match player availability
description: IOS & Android app to help amateur sports teams keep track of their fixtures and player availability. 400+ reviews on AppStore, 4.8 star average rating. #1 paid sports app in the UK one week after release

title: Tapin
tagline: Trusted careers advice, delivered on social
description: A platform to provide trusted careers advice to students through social media as well as to connect student content creators to companies

title: Silver Swan Search
description: A bespoke recruitment platform to connect job seekers with individuals seeking pilots, yacht captains, etstate managers and more. Integrated with Bullhorn CRM

title: Idopia
tagline: Idea sharing platform to help connect skilled entrepreneurs
description: An invite only social media platform for entrepreneurs to create, recruit, team up, and get their projects off the ground at lightning speed

title: Loop Beauty
tagline: Your destination for the best in beauty for Women of Colour
description: A one stop shop for beauty inspiration, tips, tutorials and makeup products from top beauty influencers, also features a full admin platform and influencer portal

title: Gen H
tagline: Homebuying from start to finish, and beyond
description: Rebuilding the homebuying process to make it simple, transparent and fair. And helping thousands of people realise their homeownership dreams at the same time

title: Foenix Coding
tagline: Industrial inkjet printers for all types of production lines
description: A store front for some of the most advanced printing systems on the market today, clean, bold design to hold focus on the product

title: Navvigo
tagline: Bespoke travel itinerary planner for city breaks
description: An engaging way to plan city breaks and discover optimised itineraries with little to no effort. Put on hold as a result of the Coronavirus pandemic

title: Checkin
tagline: COVID-19 compliant check-in system for a modern office
description: Fully customisable and hands free check in system for the modern office. Used for 5 months in offices around London until the product shutdown during lockdown
